#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main() {
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	ll t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		ll p, q;
		cin>>p>>q;
		ll ar[26] = {0};
		ll sl = s.length();
		for(ll  i = 0 ; i < sl ; i++)
		{
			ar[s[i]-'a']++;
		}
		ll cum = 0;
		for(ll i = 0 ; i < 26 ; i++)
		{
			cum+=(ar[i]*p);
			ar[i] = cum;
		}
		
		for(ll i = 0 ;i < q ; i++)
		{
			ll n;
			cin>>n;
			for(ll j = 0 ; j < 26 ; j++)
			{
				if(n<=ar[j])
				{
					cout<<(char)(j+'a')<<endl;
					break;
				}
			}
			if(n>cum)
			{
				cout<<-1<<endl;
			}
		}	
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
